                            java.lang.String charsetName,
                            java.lang.String baseUri)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Injects the document element into the base document.
        Parameters:
        htmlBase - base html document (it must have basic html structure (html/body).
        charsetName - charset to use, for example 'UTF-8'.
        baseUri - URI of the base document.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if htmlBase or @code baseUri is null.
        java.lang.Exception
